txt.en: Thorlind can be found near Tholkát.\n\nYou should talk to Thorlind.
Taurogrim wood-trolls can be found in Tholkát, in northern Eryn Lasgalen.\n\nYou should defeat wood-trolls in Tholkát.

'Though we have defeated one of their leaders, the Taurogrim still swarm these pine barrens. We have truly come to the heart of this evil and must purge these abominations before they threaten Felegoth. Enter Tholkát and defeat as many Taurogrim as you can before their numbers can overwhelm us.'
The Taurogrim have taken over an area of Eryn Lasgalen called Tholkát. Thorlind has asked you to defeat them so their evil cannot spread.
'Thank you for your help, [placeholder]. I will be more vigilant in my watch of our realm so the Taurogrim can never again return.'
